children.step: [{"step":"Gather ingredients"}, {"step":"Preheat oven to 425°F (218°C)"}, {"step":"Mix dry ingredients in a bowl"}, {"step":"Add yeast and let it sit for 5 minutes"}, {"step":"In another bowl, mix wet ingredients"}, {"step":"Combine wet and dry ingredients until well mixed"}, {"step":"Knead dough on a floured surface for about 10 minutes"}, {"step":"Place dough in a greased bowl, cover, and let rise for 1 hour"}, {"step":"Punch down the risen dough and shape into a loaf"}, {"step":"Place shaped bread onto a baking sheet or in a loaf pan"}, {"step":"Score the top of the loaf with a sharp knife"}, {"step":"Bake for 30-35 minutes or until golden brown"}, {"step":"Remove from oven and let cool on a wire rack"}]
